chart.title: Share of new cars sold that are battery-electric and plug-in hybrid
chart.subtitle: [Plug-in hybrids](#dod:plugin_hybrid) cars can run using an electric motor and rechargeable battery, or an internal combustion engine. Their battery is usually smaller than a [fully battery-electric](#dod:battery_electric).
chart.citation: International Energy Agency. Global EV Outlook 2025.
